guidelinesPage.title: Safety & Usage Guidelines
guidelinesPage.subtitle: SEU Matrimony is committed to maintaining a safe environment. Please read the following rules carefully before using the platform.
guidelinesPage.profileVerificationDesc: Every profile must be verified with @seu.edu.bd email. Accounts will be permanently banned for providing fake information.
guidelinesPage.privacyFirstDesc: Make sure before sharing your contact number or personal information with anyone. We keep chat options hidden until requests are accepted.
guidelinesPage.photosMediaDesc: Upload decent and clear photos. Even with screenshot protection on, refrain from sharing sensitive photos for your own safety.
guidelinesPage.tip1: Do not make any financial transactions on the first meeting.
guidelinesPage.tip2: Inform family elders before meeting in person and meet in public places.
guidelinesPage.tip3: If someone's behavior seems suspicious, immediately use the 'Report' button.
guidelinesPage.chatReply: I accepted your request. Can we talk?
guidelinesPage.footerQuote: Our goal is to make your journey to find a life partner simple and safe.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: How we protect your personal information
privacyPolicy.noticeText: SEU Matrimony is exclusively for students and alumni of Southeast University. By using our platform, you agree to this privacy policy and our terms of service. We verify all profiles to ensure authenticity and safety.

personalItems.item1: Name, email address, and contact information

items.item1: Create and manage your matrimonial profile
items.item4: Verify your identity and prevent fraud
items.item5: Send notifications about matches and messages
items.item6: Improve our services and user experience

whoCanSeeItems.item1: Verified members can view your public profile
whoCanSeeItems.item2: Only connected members can see your contact details
whoCanSeeItems.item3: Admins can access profiles for verification purposes
whoCanSeeItems.item4: We never sell your personal information to third parties
whoCanSeeItems.item5: We do not share data with external advertisers

legalItems.item1: We may disclose information if required by law
legalItems.item2: To protect our rights and prevent fraud
legalItems.item3: In response to valid legal requests

measuresItems.item2: Secure HTTPS connections for all communications
measuresItems.item5: Role-based access control for admin functions

responsibilityItems.item4: Do not share sensitive information in messages

items.item1: Access your personal data at any time
items.item4: Download your data in a portable format
items.item6: Control who can view your profile

items.item2: Preference cookies for language and theme
items.item3: Analytics cookies to improve user experience
items.item4: You can disable cookies in your browser settings
items.item5: Some features may not work without cookies

items.item6: You can manage notification preferences in settings

privacyPolicy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. When you delete your account:

dataRetentionItems.item1: Your profile and personal data are permanently deleted within 30 days
dataRetentionItems.item2: Messages and connection history are removed
dataRetentionItems.item3: Some data may be retained for legal compliance (e.g., fraud prevention)

privacyPolicy.ageRequirementText: SEU Matrimony is intended for users aged 18 and above. We do not knowingly collect information from individuals under 18. If you believe a minor has created an account, please contact us immediately.
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by:

changesItems.item1: Posting the updated policy on this page
changesItems.item2: Sending an email notification to registered users
changesItems.item3: Displaying a prominent notice on the platform

privacyPolicy.changesAcceptance: Your continued use of SEU Matrimony after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Rules and guidelines for using our platform
termsOfService.agreementText: By creating an account, accessing, or using SEU Matrimony, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our platform.

whoCanUseItems.item1: You must be a current student or alumni of Southeast University
whoCanUseItems.item2: You must be at least 18 years of age
whoCanUseItems.item3: You must provide accurate and truthful information
whoCanUseItems.item4: You must have a valid SEU email address for verification
whoCanUseItems.item5: You must not have been previously banned from the platform
whoCanUseItems.item6: You must be legally eligible to marry according to your jurisdiction

responsibilitiesItems.item1: Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
responsibilitiesItems.item2: You are responsible for all activities under your account
responsibilitiesItems.item3: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
responsibilitiesItems.item4: Do not share your account with others
responsibilitiesItems.item5: Keep your profile information accurate and up-to-date
responsibilitiesItems.item6: One person may only create one account

youAgreeItems.item1: Use the platform solely for finding a marriage partner
youAgreeItems.item2: Treat all members with respect and dignity
youAgreeItems.item3: Provide honest and accurate information in your profile
youAgreeItems.item5: Report any suspicious or inappropriate behavior
youAgreeItems.item6: Respect the privacy of other members
youAgreeItems.item7: Follow all applicable laws and regulations

purposeItems.item1: SEU Matrimony is exclusively for serious matrimonial purposes
purposeItems.item2: Not for casual dating, networking, or business promotion
purposeItems.item3: Not for solicitation or commercial activities
purposeItems.item4: Not for harassment or inappropriate conduct

strictlyForbiddenItems.item4: Sharing explicit, offensive, or inappropriate content
strictlyForbiddenItems.item9: Attempting to hack or compromise the platform
strictlyForbiddenItems.item12: Sharing contact information publicly before connection

consequencesItems.item3: Reporting to university authorities if applicable
consequencesItems.item5: No refund of any fees paid (if applicable)

guidelinesItems.item1: All profile information must be truthful and accurate
guidelinesItems.item2: Photos must be recent and clearly show your face
guidelinesItems.item3: No group photos, celebrity photos, or inappropriate images
guidelinesItems.item4: Educational details must match SEU records
guidelinesItems.item5: Family and personal information must be genuine
guidelinesItems.item6: We reserve the right to verify any information provided

verificationItems.item1: All profiles undergo admin verification before approval
verificationItems.item2: We may request additional documentation for verification
verificationItems.item3: Verification does not guarantee the accuracy of all information
verificationItems.item4: Members are responsible for their own due diligence
verificationItems.item5: Report any discrepancies or false information immediately

requestsItems.item1: Send connection requests only to profiles you are genuinely interested in
requestsItems.item2: Respect rejection - do not repeatedly contact someone who declined
requestsItems.item3: Contact information is shared only after mutual acceptance
requestsItems.item4: Be respectful and professional in all communications
requestsItems.item5: Do not share personal contact details in initial messages

messagingItems.item2: No harassment, abuse, or inappropriate content
messagingItems.item3: Do not request money or financial assistance
messagingItems.item4: Report any suspicious or uncomfortable interactions
messagingItems.item5: We may monitor messages for safety and compliance
messagingItems.item6: Messages may be reviewed in case of reported violations

yourContentItems.item1: You retain ownership of content you upload (photos, text)
yourContentItems.item2: You grant us license to display your content on the platform
yourContentItems.item3: You confirm you have rights to all content you upload
yourContentItems.item4: You are responsible for any copyright violations
yourContentItems.item5: We may remove content that violates our policies

ourContentItems.item1: All platform design, code, and features are our property
ourContentItems.item2: SEU Matrimony name, logo, and branding are protected
ourContentItems.item3: You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content
ourContentItems.item4: You may not reverse engineer or extract our code
ourContentItems.item5: Unauthorized use may result in legal action

platformItems.item1: We provide a platform to connect people, not guarantee matches
platformItems.item2: We do not conduct background checks on members
platformItems.item3: We are not responsible for the accuracy of user information
platformItems.item4: We do not guarantee the success of any relationship
platformItems.item5: Members are responsible for their own safety and decisions
platformItems.item6: Always meet in public places and inform family/friends

liabilityItems.item1: We are not liable for any damages arising from platform use
liabilityItems.item2: We are not responsible for user conduct or interactions
liabilityItems.item3: We are not liable for technical issues or service interruptions
liabilityItems.item4: We are not responsible for third-party links or content
liabilityItems.item5: Maximum liability is limited to fees paid (if applicable)
liabilityItems.item6: Some jurisdictions may not allow these limitations

yourRightItems.item1: You may delete your account at any time from settings
yourRightItems.item2: Account deletion is permanent and cannot be undone
yourRightItems.item3: Your data will be deleted within 30 days
yourRightItems.item4: Some information may be retained for legal compliance
yourRightItems.item5: No refunds for any fees paid (if applicable)

ourRightItems.item1: We may suspend or terminate accounts for policy violations
ourRightItems.item2: We may terminate accounts for suspicious activity
ourRightItems.item3: We may terminate accounts for inactivity (after notice)
ourRightItems.item4: We may terminate service at any time with notice
ourRightItems.item5: Terminated users may not create new accounts
ourRightItems.item6: We are not liable for any losses from termination

termsOfService.safetyText: Your safety is paramount. Please follow these guidelines:
termsOfService.disputeText: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of Bangladesh. Any disputes arising from the use of SEU Matrimony will be resolved through:

disputeItems.item1: Good faith negotiations between the parties
disputeItems.item3: Arbitration or legal proceedings in Dhaka, Bangladesh

termsOfService.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify you of any significant changes by:

changesItems.item1: Posting the updated terms on this page
changesItems.item2: Sending an email notification to registered users
changesItems.item3: Displaying a prominent notice on the platform

termsOfService.changesAcceptance: Your continued use of SEU Matrimony after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
termsOfService.severabilityText: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that the Terms will otherwise remain in full force and effect.
termsOfService.questionsText: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Service, please contact us. We're here to ensure a safe and positive experience for all members.

safetyTips.tip1: Always meet in public places for first meetings
safetyTips.tip2: Inform family or friends about your meetings
safetyTips.tip3: Never share financial information or send money
safetyTips.tip4: Trust your instincts - report suspicious behavior immediately
safetyTips.tip5: Verify information independently before making decisions

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.subtitle: Find answers to common questions

safety.title: Safety Guidelines
safety.description: Important tips to stay safe while using the platform

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Understand how we protect your personal information

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Read our platform rules and user agreement

helpCenter.noResultsDesc: Try different keywords or browse by category
helpCenter.stillNeedHelpDesc: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help with any questions or concerns.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account on SEU Matrimony?
createAccount.answer: To create an account: 1) Click 'Register' on the homepage, 2) Enter your SEU email address, 3) Create a strong password, 4) Verify your email through the link sent to your inbox, 5) Complete your profile with accurate information. Your profile will be reviewed by our admin team before approval.

whoCanJoin.question: Who can join SEU Matrimony?
whoCanJoin.answer: SEU Matrimony is exclusively for current students and alumni of Southeast University. You must be at least 18 years old, have a valid SEU email address, and be genuinely interested in finding a marriage partner. All profiles are verified to ensure authenticity.

verificationTime.question: How long does profile verification take?
verificationTime.answer: Profile verification typically takes 24-48 hours. Our admin team reviews each profile to ensure all information is accurate and meets our guidelines. You will receive an email notification once your profile is approved. If additional information is needed, we will contact you.

biodataInfo.question: What information should I include in my biodata?
biodataInfo.answer: Your biodata should include: personal details (name, age, height), educational background (department, batch), family information, religious preferences, and a brief description about yourself and what you are looking for in a partner. Be honest and accurate - this helps in finding compatible matches.

editProfile.question: Can I edit my profile after it is approved?
editProfile.answer: Yes, you can edit your profile anytime from the Dashboard > Biodata Form. However, significant changes may require re-verification by our admin team. Minor updates like adding photos or updating your description can be done instantly.

photoUpload.question: What kind of photos should I upload?
photoUpload.answer: Upload recent, clear photos that show your face. Photos should be appropriate and modest. Avoid group photos, heavily filtered images, or photos with inappropriate backgrounds. You can upload multiple photos to give a better representation of yourself.

standOut.question: How do I make my profile stand out?
standOut.answer: To make your profile attractive: 1) Upload clear, recent photos, 2) Write a genuine and detailed description, 3) Be specific about your preferences, 4) Keep your information up-to-date, 5) Be honest about your expectations, 6) Respond promptly to connection requests.

sendRequest.question: How do I send a connection request?
sendRequest.answer: Browse profiles from the 'Browse Matches' page. When you find someone interesting, click 'Send Request' on their profile. They will receive a notification and can accept or decline. If accepted, you can exchange contact information and start communicating.

afterAccepted.question: What happens after a connection is accepted?
afterAccepted.answer: Once your connection request is accepted, both parties can view each other's contact information (email, phone number if provided). You can then communicate directly through the platform's messaging system or exchange contact details for further communication.

cancelRequest.question: Can I cancel a connection request?
cancelRequest.answer: Yes, you can cancel a pending connection request anytime before it is accepted. Go to 'My Requests' in your dashboard and click 'Cancel' next to the request. Once a request is accepted, you cannot cancel it, but you can remove the connection from your friends list.

requestLimit.question: How many connection requests can I send?
requestLimit.answer: There is no strict limit on connection requests, but we encourage quality over quantity. Send requests only to profiles you are genuinely interested in. Sending too many requests without proper consideration may be flagged as spam.

rejection.question: What if someone rejects my request?
rejection.answer: Rejection is a normal part of the process. Respect their decision and do not send repeated requests or try to contact them through other means. There are many other compatible profiles on the platform. Keep searching and stay positive!

safety.question: How does SEU Matrimony ensure my safety?
safety.answer: We verify all profiles through SEU email addresses, have admin approval for all biodatas, monitor suspicious activities, provide reporting mechanisms, and never share your contact information without your consent. However, always exercise caution and follow our safety guidelines.

suspicious.question: What should I do if I encounter suspicious behavior?
suspicious.answer: If you encounter any suspicious behavior, harassment, or fake profiles, immediately report it using the 'Report' button on the profile or contact our support team. We take all reports seriously and will investigate promptly. Your safety is our priority.

personalInfo.question: Should I share my personal information?
personalInfo.answer: Only share personal information (phone number, address) after you have established trust and are comfortable. Never share financial information or send money to anyone. Always meet in public places for first meetings and inform family or friends about your plans.

dataProtection.question: How is my data protected?
dataProtection.answer: We use industry-standard encryption, secure HTTPS connections, Firebase Authentication, and regular security audits. Your data is stored securely and never sold to third parties. Read our Privacy Policy for detailed information about data protection.

firstMeeting.question: What are the safety tips for first meetings?
firstMeeting.answer: For first meetings: 1) Always meet in public places, 2) Inform family or friends about your meeting, 3) Arrange your own transportation, 4) Do not share financial information, 5) Trust your instincts, 6) Keep initial meetings short, 7) Video call before meeting in person.

forgotPassword.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
forgotPassword.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your registered email address, and you will receive a password reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password. If you do not receive the email, check your spam folder or contact support.

changeEmail.question: How do I change my email address?
changeEmail.answer: Currently, email addresses cannot be changed as they are tied to your SEU verification. If you need to update your email due to graduation or other reasons, please contact our support team with your new SEU alumni email for assistance.

deleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: To delete your account: Go to Dashboard > Account Settings > Delete Account. This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data, including profile, messages, and connections, will be deleted within 30 days. Consider deactivating instead if you might return.

deactivateVsDelete.question: What is the difference between deactivating and deleting?
deactivateVsDelete.answer: Deactivating temporarily hides your profile and you can reactivate anytime by logging in. Deleting permanently removes all your data and cannot be undone. Choose deactivation if you need a break but might return, and deletion if you are sure you want to leave permanently.

suspended.question: Why was my account suspended?
suspended.answer: Accounts may be suspended for violating our Terms of Service, such as fake information, harassment, inappropriate content, or suspicious activity. If your account was suspended, you should have received an email explaining the reason. Contact support if you believe this was a mistake.

noNotifications.question: I am not receiving email notifications. What should I do?
noNotifications.answer: Check your spam/junk folder first. Add support@seumatrimony.com to your contacts. Verify your email settings in Dashboard > Account Settings > Notifications. Ensure your email address is correct. If the issue persists, contact our support team.
